languages.text: "Ваши цвета..." {n}Кассия хмурится, разгоняя рукой невидимую тучку над вашей головой.{/n} "Они стали темней и болезненней".

traits.locale_text: "Ваши цвета..." {n}Кассия хмурится, разгоняя рукой невидимую тучку над вашей макушкой.{/n} "Они стали темней и болезненней".

languages.text: "Your colours..." {n}Cassia frowns and waves away an unseen cloud hanging over your head.{/n} "They have darkened, become more... sickly."
languages.original_text: "Ваши цвета..." {n}Кассия хмурится, разгоняя рукой невидимую тучку над вашей головой.{/n} "Они стали темней и болезненней".

traits.locale_text: "Your colours..." {n}Cassia frowns and waves away an unseen cloud hanging over your head.{/n} "They have darkened, become more... sickly."

"Your colours..." {n}Cassia frowns and waves away an unseen cloud hanging over your head.{/n} "They have darkened, become more... sickly."

languages.text: “你的颜色……”{n}卡西娅皱起眉头，挥手驱散了仿佛悬在你头顶的看不见的乌云。{/n}“变得好暗淡，好……压抑。”
languages.original_text: "Your colours..." {n}Cassia frowns and waves away an unseen cloud hanging over your head.{/n} "They have darkened, become more... sickly."

traits.locale_text: “你的颜色……”{n}卡西娅皱起眉头，挥手驱散了仿佛悬在你头顶的看不见的乌云。{/n}“变得好暗淡，好……压抑。”

languages.text: "Eure Farben ..." {n}Cassia runzelt die Stirn und wischt eine unsichtbare Wolke weg, die über deinem Kopf hängt.{/n} "Sie sind dunkler geworden ... kränklicher."
languages.original_text: "Your colours..." {n}Cassia frowns and waves away an unseen cloud hanging over your head.{/n} "They have darkened, become more... sickly."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Farben ..." {n}Cassia runzelt die Stirn und wischt eine unsichtbare Wolke weg, die über deinem Kopf hängt.{/n} "Sie sind dunkler geworden ... kränklicher."

languages.text: « Vos couleurs... » {n}commence Cassia en fronçant les sourcils et en chassant un nuage invisible au-dessus de votre tête.{/n} « Elles se sont assombries, elles sont devenues plus... maladives. »
languages.original_text: "Your colours..." {n}Cassia frowns and waves away an unseen cloud hanging over your head.{/n} "They have darkened, become more... sickly."

traits.locale_text: « Vos couleurs... » {n}commence Cassia en fronçant les sourcils et en chassant un nuage invisible au-dessus de votre tête.{/n} « Elles se sont assombries, elles sont devenues plus... maladives. »

languages.text: «Sus colores...». {n}Cassia frunce el ceño y aleja con la mano una nube invisible que pende sobre tu cabeza.{/n} «Se han vuelto más oscuros, más... enfermizos».
languages.original_text: "Your colours..." {n}Cassia frowns and waves away an unseen cloud hanging over your head.{/n} "They have darkened, become more... sickly."

traits.locale_text: «Sus colores...». {n}Cassia frunce el ceño y aleja con la mano una nube invisible que pende sobre tu cabeza.{/n} «Se han vuelto más oscuros, más... enfermizos».

languages.text: 「{name}様の色が…」{n}カシアは眉をひそめて、あなたの頭上に漂う見えない雲を手で払いのける。{/n}「暗くなって、もっと…病的になっています」
languages.original_text: "Your colours..." {n}Cassia frowns and waves away an unseen cloud hanging over your head.{/n} "They have darkened, become more... sickly."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}様の色が…」{n}カシアは眉をひそめて、あなたの頭上に漂う見えない雲を手で払いのける。{/n}「暗くなって、もっと…病的になっています」

languages.text: "Renklerin..." {n}Cassia kaşlarını çatıyor. Başının üzerindeki bulutları dağıtmaya çalışır gibi bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Renklerin koyulaşmış. Daha bir... Fenalaşmış."
languages.original_text: "Your colours..." {n}Cassia frowns and waves away an unseen cloud hanging over your head.{/n} "They have darkened, become more... sickly."
